description: Attention Dawg Nation: If you’re headed south this weekend to watch your University of Georgia Bulldogs play the Florida Gators, you may want to pay special attention to what driving route you take to the big game.
title: Ticket traps to avoid when driving to the UGA-Florida game
title_page: Ticket traps to avoid when driving to the UGA-Florida game
text:
Attention Dawg Nation: If you’re headed south this weekend to watch your University of Georgia Bulldogs play the Florida Gators, you may want to pay special attention to what driving route you take to the big game. Below you’ll find some of the most popular roadways for getting to Jacksonville. Some of the biggest ticket traps in Georgia happen to be situated along these routes.
Want to know about other ticket traps to steer clear of? Read the Atlanta Journal-Constitution investigation that examines traffic fines paid last year in more than 500 cities and counties throughout Georgia.
Any driver can also use this exclusive AJC online database to see how much ticket revenue was generated last year in cities and counties across the state. Or, look up the full map of Georgia's 50 worst ticket trap jurisdictions for 2014.
